front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Medical Device Communications -- Medical Device Data Language (MDDL) Virtual Medical Device, Specialized -- Temperature

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard establishes a model for the implementation of the Temperature Virtual Medical Device. It establishes a Design Model and specifies how this Model should be implemented. It also provides guidance concerning bandwidth requirements as well as how to specify conformance with this standard.
